class.name: VisualShaderNodeIf
class.brief_description: Compares two floating-point numbers in order to return a required vector within the visual shader graph.
class.description: First two ports are scalar floating-point numbers to compare, third is tolerance comparison amount and last three ports represents a vectors returned if [code]a == b[/code], [code]a > b[/code] and [code]a < b[/code] respectively.
